tool.name: klastn
tool.description: Search nucleotide database with nucleotide query sequence(s)
tool.command: ## The command is a Cheetah template which allows some Python based syntax. ## Lines starting hash hash are comments. Galaxy will turn newlines into spaces Klast.sh -p plastn -i "$query" @KLAST_DB_SUBJECT_NUCL@ @BASIC_PARAMS@ -e $evalue_cutoff -o "$output1" -outfmt 2 -nohit false #if $ext_param.ext_param_selector=="extended": $ext_param.filter_query $ext_param.strand $ext_param.match_mismatch #end if #if $config_param.config_param_selector=="advanced": -a $config_param.nb_threads -max-database-size $config_param.max_db_size #if (str($config_param.ungap_threshold_nucl) and int(str($config_param.ungap_threshold_nucl)) > 0): -s $config_param.ungap_threshold_nucl #end if ##-xdrop-ungap $config_param.ungap_Xdrop -X $config_param.gap_Xdrop -Z $config_param.final_gap_Xdrop #end if
